<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_cb_topic"><sys_cb_topic action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><applicability/><connect_queue/><description>Change the address information for the currently logged in user.  Can be easily adapted to other tables with street, city, state, and zip fields.</description><graph>{

        "678b60ed669f4ea395020b2b966a0d73": {
          "id": "678b60ed669f4ea395020b2b966a0d73",
          "name": "Get User's Address",
          "script": "(function execute() {\n   \n    var grUser = new GlideRecordSecure('sys_user');\n    grUser.addQuery('sys_id',gs.getUserID())\n    grUser.query();\n\n    if(grUser.next()){\n\n        vaVars.newstreet = grUser.getValue('street');\n        vaVars.newcity = grUser.getValue('city');\n        vaVars.newstate = grUser.getValue('state');\n        vaVars.newzip = grUser.getValue('zip');\n    }\n    vaVars.count = grUser.getRowCount();\n})()\n",
          "stepType": "ScriptAction",
          "applicability": ""
        },
        "64bdcec3f32b48379fe8c7fc281c30ae": {
          "id": "64bdcec3f32b48379fe8c7fc281c30ae",
          "stepType": "TextOutput",
          "name": "Address being updated",
          "value": {
            "value": "Your address is being updated ...",
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "applicability": ""
        },
        "3d0c7b1b242e41c8b2eccbf5eb0d16bd": {
          "id": "3d0c7b1b242e41c8b2eccbf5eb0d16bd",
          "stepType": "TextOutput",
          "name": "Display Current Address",
          "value": {
            "value": "(function execute() {\n    var htmlAddress = \"Your current address on record is: <br/>\";\n    \n    htmlAddress += \"Street: \" + vaVars.newstreet + \"<br/>\";\n    htmlAddress += \"City: \" + vaVars.newcity  + \"<br/>\";\n    htmlAddress += \"State: \" + vaVars.newstate + \"<br/>\";\n    htmlAddress += \"Zip Code: \" + vaVars.newzip + \"<br/>\";\n    \n    return htmlAddress;\n})()\n",
            "mode": "script"
          },
          "applicability": ""
        },
        "f367e881be244650a53e0d8eff5ea586": {

        "8a78ebc40ead4668845379d0694463e9": {

          "name": "Decision"

        "dc43fe64976c427b85de3db1e20a495c": {
          "id": "dc43fe64976c427b85de3db1e20a495c",

        "18f0bfd7e5b740efa1ba59ed71cdf827": {
          "id": "18f0bfd7e5b740efa1ba59ed71cdf827",
          "stepType": "TextOutput",
          "name": "New Address",
          "value": {
            "value": "(function execute() {\n    var htmlAddress = 'You provided the following information: <br/>';\n\n    if(vaInputs.tochange == 0){\n        vaVars.newstreet = vaInputs.mystreet;\n        vaVars.newcity = vaInputs.mycity;\n        vaVars.newstate = vaInputs.mystate;\n        vaVars.newzip = vaInputs.myzip;\n    }else if(vaInputs.tochange == 1){\n        vaVars.newstreet = vaInputs.mystreet;\n    }else if(vaInputs.tochange == 2){\n        vaVars.newcity = vaInputs.mycity;\n    }else if(vaInputs.tochange == 3){\n        vaVars.newstate = vaInputs.mystate;\n    }else if(vaInputs.tochange == 4){        \n        vaVars.newzip = vaInputs.myzip;\n    }else{\n        gs.warn('Nothing Changed');\n    }\n    \n    htmlAddress += \"Street: \" + vaVars.newstreet + \"<br/>\";\n    htmlAddress += \"City: \" + vaVars.newcity  + \"<br/>\";\n    htmlAddress += \"State: \" + vaVars.newstate + \"<br/>\";\n    htmlAddress += \"Zip Code: \" + vaVars.newzip + \"<br/>\";\n\n    return htmlAddress;\n})()",
            "mode": "script"
          },
          "applicability": ""
        },
        "763fbd8363b0480282ce6f7f9270e761": {
          "id": "763fbd8363b0480282ce6f7f9270e761",
          "stepType": "Prompt",
          "name": "Validate New Address",
          "prompt": {
            "value": "Are the changes correct?",
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "confirmMessage": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "simple"

            "mode": "simple"

          "variableId": "f9b877eadd0d460bbf091a1bf1672c2c"

        "5ad565b6d5424defa7a5f92140bc79a1": {

        "a42f668b0c2147068f4efea1043a74ae": {
          "id": "a42f668b0c2147068f4efea1043a74ae",
          "name": "Update User Record",
          "script": "(function execute() {\n    var grUser = new GlideRecord('sys_user');\n    \n    grUser.get(gs.getUserID());\n    grUser.street = vaVars.newstreet;\n    grUser.city = vaVars.newcity;\n    grUser.state = vaVars.newstate;\n    grUser.zip = vaVars.newzip;\n\n    grUser.update();\n})()\n",
          "stepType": "ScriptAction",
          "applicability": ""
        },
        "1afe806cad0e451c8e1795df517d1116": {
          "id": "1afe806cad0e451c8e1795df517d1116",

          "name": "Address Updated",
          "value": {

            "mode": "simple"

        },

 var htmlAddress = 'You provided the following information: <br/>';

 if(vaInputs.tochange == 0){
 vaVars.newstreet = vaInputs.mystreet;
 vaVars.newcity = vaInputs.mycity;
 vaVars.newstate = vaInputs.mystate;
 vaVars.newzip = vaInputs.myzip;
 }else if(vaInputs.tochange == 1){
 vaVars.newstreet = vaInputs.mystreet;
 }else if(vaInputs.tochange == 2){
 vaVars.newcity = vaInputs.mycity;
 }else if(vaInputs.tochange == 3){
 vaVars.newstate = vaInputs.mystate;
 }else if(vaInputs.tochange == 4){ 
 vaVars.newzip = vaInputs.myzip;
 }else{
 gs.warn('Nothing Changed');
 }
 
 htmlAddress += "Street: " + vaVars.newstreet + "<br/>";
 htmlAddress += "City: " + vaVars.newcity + "<br/>";
 htmlAddress += "State: " + vaVars.newstate + "<br/>";
 htmlAddress += "Zip Code: " + vaVars.newzip + "<br/>";

 return htmlAddress;
})()"},"id":"18f0bfd7e5b740efa1ba59ed71cdf827","name":"New Address","goal_id":"8ef060bac15e4b3c90f91c20f0f8e699"},{"type":"InputPrompt","variable_id":"f9b877eadd0d460bbf091a1bf1672c2c","message":{"type":"String","mode":"string","value":"Are the changes correct?"},"optional":false,"id":"763fbd8363b0480282ce6f7f9270e761","name":"Validate New Address","goal_id":"8ef060bac15e4b3c90f91c20f0f8e699"},{"type":"Decision","name":"Decision","branches":[{"type":"Branch","label":"Yes","expression":{"type":"Applicability","mode":"script","value":"(function execute() {
